name: The Gold Driver
description:
The Gold Driver is an individual student game that I created in 1 month.

In this game, as a candidate for a mining job, you have to drive 3 wagons in the same time to exploit the mine as well as possible to enrich its owner.

It will challenge your anticipation and concentration skills, so be ready !

Please let me know your opinion to help me progress.

I made the game by myself with all the following resources :

· 3D : 

- Cube World Mine Rail System - By BitGem

· UI :

- Fantasy Wooden GUI : Free - By Black Hammer

· Font: 

- Carnivalee Freakshow - By Christopher Hansen - From Dafont.com

· VFX : 

- Cartoon FX Free Pack - By RetroVistas

· 2D Art :

- Images by upklyak on Freepik 

· Sound : 

- SFX from Zapsplat

- Royalty free SFX from Youtube

- Running Eiskrokodil - By Lobo Loco - From freemusicarchive.org

- Get your kicks on future 86 - By Superstorm - From freemusicarchive.org
